001
002package com.commercetools.money;
003
004import java.math.BigDecimal;
005
006import javax.money.CurrencyUnit;
007import javax.money.MonetaryAmount;
008
009public interface MonetaryProvider {
010
011    public MonetaryAmount asMonetaryAmount(final long amount, final long fractionDigits, final String currencyCode);
012
013    public MonetaryAmount asMonetaryAmount(final long amount, final long fractionDigits,
014            final CurrencyUnit currencyCode);
015
016    public MonetaryAmount asMonetaryAmount(final double amount, final CurrencyUnit currencyCode);
017
018    public MonetaryAmount asMonetaryAmount(final BigDecimal amount, final CurrencyUnit currencyCode);
019}
